lord.of.rome

Class Place

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.DrawableObject
      • lord.of.rome.Place
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Settlement

    public class Place
extends DrawableObject
    Class that simulates concept of place. It has own localization and name.
    Author:
    Carlos
